text: <@U39DT5YFL> Its `}}` HubL, keep a space between the brackets `}_}`  for object notation. And use it without for HubL template engine syntax.

CSS files attached to modules using the default method (css_assets in meta.json) donâ€™t have correct file paths on pages using child themes. So they are loaded from the parent theme (parent theme file paths), with the parent theme settings instead of child theme settings. The rest of the CSS files are loaded correctly.
